overview: Alain and Yves Dognin, 54 year old twins, live with their parents in a dilapidated apartment that seems to have stopped in time. Alain paints brightly colored canvases while Yves listens to music. Their day is punctuated by mass, medical care and meals. Episode of "Strip-tease", a Franco-Belgian documentary TV series.
title: Les miettes du purgatoire
